experience.title: Associate
experience.description: Part of the Strategy and Value Creation Team:- Assessment and articulation of new fund initiatives (Asset Class, Geography, Sector, Vehicles).- Provision of capital advisory and strategic guidance to our portfolio companies.- Active involvement in fundraising, reporting, and overall relationship management with Limited Partners across all of Shorooq's verticals (Venture Capital, Credit).
experience.description_html: Part of the Strategy and Value Creation Team:- Assessment and articulation of new fund initiatives (Asset Class, Geography, Sector, Vehicles).- Provision of capital advisory and strategic guidance to our portfolio companies.- Active involvement in fundraising, reporting, and overall relationship management with Limited Partners across all of Shorooq's verticals (Venture Capital, Credit). <!---->

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: Part of the Government and Policy Advisory Team:- Contributed to the strategic reorganization of a national healthcare system in a GCC country, with an emphasis on enhancing operational frameworks and service quality.- Designed a model to predict future trends, jobs, capabilities, and project economic indicators in line with a national strategy.- Developed a policy framework to improve the integration of individuals with special needs into society, ensuring equal opportunities and accessibility.- Created and executed an advocacy strategy for a GCC country to bolster its global engagement and representation at a significant international event.- Devised and implemented national KPIs to support the increased integration of nationals and women into the private sector workforce, promoting gender parity and economic inclusion.- Participated in the formation of a sovereign wealth fund dedicated to entrepreneurial initiatives, aimed at economic diversification and innovation.- Contributed to the labor policy reform in a GCC country by redefining unemployment categories, enabling the development of bespoke employment programs.
experience.description_html: Part of the Government and Policy Advisory Team:- Contributed to the strategic reorganization of a national healthcare system in a GCC country, with an emphasis on enhancing operational frameworks and service quality.- Designed a model to predict future trends, jobs, capabilities, and project economic indicators in line with a national strategy.- Developed a policy framework to improve the integration of individuals with special needs into society, ensuring equal opportunities and accessibility.- Created and executed an advocacy strategy for a GCC country to bolster its global engagement and representation at a significant international event.- Devised and implemented national KPIs to support the increased integration of nationals and women into the private sector workforce, promoting gender parity and economic inclusion.- Participated in the formation of a sovereign wealth fund dedicated to entrepreneurial initiatives, aimed at economic diversification and innovation.- Contributed to the labor policy reform in a GCC country by redefining unemployment categories, enabling the development of bespoke employment programs.
